reviewText: I received the disc but I would not need it until a train the trainer session.  It remained in shrink wrap until 9/7/2016. I opened it to find a crack in the disc, not on the edge or in the center, but in the play surface which rendered it unviewable. Now I have a $29 coaster because  it was 3 days over the return window. I bought the book as well so I'll have to make do.  Do yourself a favor and make sure you check the disc.  There was no damage to the shipping box or the case. The only reason I can come up with is a faulty or low quality disc..
This book has some good materials inside of it and should be most helpful when it comes time to complete the necessary training to do the work needed.
